comment: I am not sure why other people have rated his online class so highly. He is not very helpful. We had an assignment opened less than 9 hours before its set due date. I emailed him about struggling on my midterm and he insulted me and said to pay attention. He's accused me of cheating in his hw feedback just because I didn't do the hw right one time.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Holtzhower is one of my favorite professors. He is very thorough in his teaching, and his lectures are very informative. He has clear grading criteria, and posts videos that walk you through how to do the assignments. The first half of the semester was a little difficult, but it got easier after the midterm.
Gives clear expectations for what the class is composed of. Mostly microsoft project assignments. Midterm, Final Project, and Final. Final could be dropped for doubling midterm grade.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

Great professor. He has a few easy homework assignments that make up 35 percent.

Solid professor, his lectures are too the point. The material is a little tricky but he helps out and has an assistant that offers even more in depth help. A few assignments throughout the semester and a final project at the end. I would recommend him to anyone.
